scripts.dev: cd ../../ && cross-var yarn cross-env MODE=local nuxt dev --config-file src/$npm_package_name/nuxt.config.js
scripts.generate:dev: cd ../../ && cross-var yarn cross-env MODE=dev nuxt generate --config-file src/$npm_package_name/nuxt.config.js
scripts.generate:release: cd ../../ && cross-var yarn cross-env MODE=release nuxt generate --config-file src/$npm_package_name/nuxt.config.js
